pageTitle: A comparison of Visio Standard and Visio Professional
textBeforeTable: Expand this table Collapse this table loadTOCNode(2, 'moreinformation'); Visio 2003 Professional provides diagramming solutions that benefit professionals in IT, in engineering, and in software development. Visio Professional 2003 includes all the business diagramming tools of Visio Standard 2003 together with additional comprehensive technical solutions and drawing solutions. loadTOCNode(2, 'moreinformation');
